testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlDetectorDataSubscription dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.6.1.1 [Need for Direct Measurements of Traffic Flow and Conditions] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Publish Detector Data (NTRM 3.3.5.2.3.2}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N105R467_Publish_Detector_Data_Parameter = ${TMDD_N105R467_Publish_Detector_Data_Parameter}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Subscribe to Detector Data Information (NTRM 3.3.5.2.3.3}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N105R468_Subscribe_to_Detector_Data_Information_Parameter = ${TMDD_N105R468_Subscribe_to_Detector_Data_Information_Parameter}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Error Report is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.1.4.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N105R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported = ${TMDD_N105R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Detector Data is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N105R475_Restrictions___Detector_Data_Supported = ${TMDD_N105R475_Restrictions___Detector_Data_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Detector Station - Detector Data is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N105R476_Detector_Station___Detector_Data_Supported = ${TMDD_N105R476_Detector_Station___Detector_Data_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Count is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N105R477_Vehicle_Count_Supported = ${TMDD_N105R477_Vehicle_Count_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Average Vehicle Occupancy is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N105R478_Average_Vehicle_Occupancy_Supported = ${TMDD_N105R478_Average_Vehicle_Occupancy_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Data Collection Start is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N105R479_Data_Collection_Start_Supported = ${TMDD_N105R479_Data_Collection_Start_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Data Collection End is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N105R480_Data_Collection_End_Supported = ${TMDD_N105R480_Data_Collection_End_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Data Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N105R481_Data_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N105R481_Data_Type_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Average Vehicle Speed is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N105R482_Average_Vehicle_Speed_Supported = ${TMDD_N105R482_Average_Vehicle_Speed_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Average Vehicle Queue is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N105R483_Average_Vehicle_Queue_Supported = ${TMDD_N105R483_Average_Vehicle_Queue_Supported}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Stops is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N105R484_Vehicle_Stops_Supported = ${TMDD_N105R484_Vehicle_Stops_Supported}

Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Count - Bin 1 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N105R485_Vehicle_Count___Bin_1_Supported = ${TMDD_N105R485_Vehicle_Count___Bin_1_Supported}

Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Count - Bin 2 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.12). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N105R486_Vehicle_Count___Bin_2_Supported = ${TMDD_N105R486_Vehicle_Count___Bin_2_Supported}

Step 17 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Count - Bin 3 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.13). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N105R487_Vehicle_Count___Bin_3_Supported = ${TMDD_N105R487_Vehicle_Count___Bin_3_Supported}

Step 18 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Count - Bin 4 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.14). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N105R488_Vehicle_Count___Bin_4_Supported = ${TMDD_N105R488_Vehicle_Count___Bin_4_Supported}

Step 19 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Count - Bin 5 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.3.5.2.15). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N105R489_Vehicle_Count___Bin_5_Supported = ${TMDD_N105R489_Vehicle_Count___Bin_5_Supported}
Step 20 CONFIGURE: Determine the number of publication message transmissions that will be received within this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationsToReceive: ${PublicationsToReceive}
Step 21 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorResponseExpected: ${PublicationErrorResponseExpected}

Step 22 CONFIGURE: IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorTypeExpected: ${PublicationErrorTypeExpected}
Step 23 CONFIGURE: Define the publication response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: PublicationResponseMessage: ${PublicationResponseMessage}
Step 24 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the Authentication parameters need to be verified within this test. RECORD this information as: AuthenticationCheck: ${AuthenticationCheck}
Step 25 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT will be allowed access to the information requested in this test. RECORD this information as: AllowAccess: ${AllowAccess}
Step 26 CONFIGURE: Define the subscription message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionMessage: ${SubscriptionMessage}
Step 27 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected}

Step 28 CONFIGURE: IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected}

Step 29 SUBSCRIPTION-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlDetectorDataSubscription RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED= SUBSCRIPTIONMESSAGE = SubscriptionMessage SUBSCRIPTIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected SUBSCRIPTIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION

Step 30 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.

Step 30.1 WHILE CONTINUEPUBLICATION is equal to TRUE then CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note:If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.

Step 30.1.1 PUBLICATION-EC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlDetectorDataUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N105R467_Publish_Detector_Data_Parameter PUBLICATIONSTORECEIVE = PublicationsToReceive PUBLICATIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorResponseExpected PUBLICATIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorTypeExpected AUTHENTICATIONCHECK = AuthenticationCheck ALLOWACCESS = AllowAccess Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION

Step 30.1.2 IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 30.1.2.1 VERIFY that a detectorDataMsg message was received.
Step 30.1.2.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item
Step 30.1.2.3 VERIFY that a detector-id data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 30.1.2.4 VERIFY that a detection-time-stamp data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 30.1.2.5 IF TMDD_N105R475_Restrictions___Detector_Data_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.1.2.5.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item
Step 30.1.2.6 IF TMDD_N105R476_Detector_Station___Detector_Data_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.1.2.6.1 VERIFY that a station-id data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 30.1.2.7 IF TMDD_N105R477_Vehicle_Count_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.1.2.7.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-count data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 30.1.2.8 IF TMDD_N105R478_Average_Vehicle_Occupancy_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.1.2.8.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-occupancy data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 30.1.2.9 IF TMDD_N105R479_Data_Collection_Start_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.1.2.9.1 VERIFY that a start-time data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 30.1.2.10 IF TMDD_N105R480_Data_Collection_End_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.1.2.10.1 VERIFY that an end-time data frame exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 30.1.2.11 IF TMDD_N105R481_Data_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.1.2.11.1 VERIFY that a detector-data-type data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 30.1.2.12 IF TMDD_N105R482_Average_Vehicle_Speed_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.1.2.12.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-speed data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 30.1.2.13 IF TMDD_N105R483_Average_Vehicle_Queue_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.1.2.13.1 VERIFY that a queue-length data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 30.1.2.14 IF TMDD_N105R484_Vehicle_Stops_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.1.2.14.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-stops data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 30.1.2.15 IF TMDD_N105R485_Vehicle_Count___Bin_1_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.1.2.15.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-count-bin1 data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 30.1.2.16 IF TMDD_N105R486_Vehicle_Count___Bin_2_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.1.2.16.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-count-bin2 data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 30.1.2.17 IF TMDD_N105R487_Vehicle_Count___Bin_3_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.1.2.17.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-count-bin3 data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 30.1.2.18 IF TMDD_N105R488_Vehicle_Count___Bin_4_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.1.2.18.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-count-bin4 data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 30.1.2.19 IF TMDD_N105R489_Vehicle_Count___Bin_5_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.1.2.19.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-count-bin5 data element exists within each instance of data frame detectorDataMsg.detector-data-item.detector-data-list.detector-data-detail
Step 30.1.2.20 VERIFY that the values within the REQUEST message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 30.1.2.21 CONFIGURE: Set CONTENTVERIFIED to True

Step 30.1.2.22 POSTCONDITION: PUBLICATION-EC-REPLY with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlDetectorDataUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N105R467_Publish_Detector_Data_Parameter CONTENTVERIFIED = CONTENTVERIFIED PUBLICATIONRESPONSEMESSAGE = PublicationResponseMessage

Step 31 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 31.1 VERIFY that an errorReportMsg message was received.
Step 31.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 31.3 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 31.4 VERIFY that an error-code data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 31.5 VERIFY that an error-text data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 31.6 VERIFY that data element error-code is set to SubscriptionErrorResponseTypeExpected.
Step 31.7 IF TMDD_N105R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 32 EXIT
